    • Uses of Point3D in Coords

      Methods in Coords with parameters of type Point3D 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      double Coords.azimuth​(Point3D gps0, Point3D gps1)
      Calculates the azimuth between to gps points
      double Coords.distance3d​(Point3D gps0, Point3D gps1)
      computes the 3D distance (in meters) between the two gps like points this distance method takes alt in calculation unlike the one in the excel file.

      Point3D Circle.get_cen()

      Methods in Geom with parameters of type Point3D 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void Point3D.add​(Point3D p)
      Adds the 2 points together by same variables
      double Point3D.angleXY​(Point3D p)
      computes the angleXY between p1 and p2 in RADIANS:

      up:(PI/2) , down (-PI/2) , right(0), left(+- PI).
      double Point3D.angleXY_2PI​(Point3D p)
      computes the angleXY between p1 and p2 in RADIANS:

      up:(PI/2) , down (1.5PI) , right(0), left(PI).
      double Point3D.angleZ​(Point3D p)
      computes the angleZ between p1 and p2 in RADIANS
      boolean Point3D.close2equals​(Point3D p2, double dist)
      Checks if the distance between 2 points is smaller than a certain distance

      double Point3D.north_angle​(Point3D p)
      return the (planer angle of the vector between this --> p, in DEGREES, in a compass order: north 0, east 90, south 180, west 270.
      int Point3D.pointLineTest​(Point3D a, Point3D b)

      BEHINDB: ן¿½ן¿½ן¿½ן¿½ן¿½a---------bן¿½ן¿½ן¿½ן¿½+ן¿½
